channel.title: CVE Feed for Google LLC -- Google Cloud IoT Device SDK for Embedded C
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Google LLC -- Google Cloud IoT Device SDK for Embedded C

item.title: CVE-2021-22547|2024-08-03T18:44:13.675Z -- google%20llc -- google%20cloud%20iot%20device%20sdk%20for%20embedded%20c
item.description: In IoT Devices SDK, there is an implementation of calloc() that doesn't have a length check. An attacker could pass in memory objects larger than the buffer and wrap around to have a smaller buffer than required, allowing the attacker access to the other parts of the heap. We recommend upgrading the Google Cloud IoT Device SDK for Embedded C used to 1.0.3 or greater.
